title: Set Up the Integral
text: Select the appropriate integral for finding the volume of the solid.

title: Integrate the Formula
text: Find the volume of the solid using the disk method. The volume of the solid of revolution formed by revolving R around the x-axis using the disk method is given by $$V=\int_{a}^{b} \pi {f{\left(x\right)}}^2 \,dx$$.
